{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = ASUS ROG Areion 10G.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asus.com/Motherboard-Accessory/ROG-AREION-10G/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_ROG_Areion_10G |wikipedia = |brand = ASUS |model = ROG Areion |submodelappend = |submodel = 10G |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/10/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_ROG_Areion_10G |sernum = 90MC04N0-M0TAY0 |series = |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = 4x |formfactor = single-lane |vendor_id = 1d6a |device_id = d107 |subvendor_id = 1043 |subdevice_id = 0107 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Aquantia;AQC107; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 10GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = 10GBase-T |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = yes |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = 10GbE (10GBase-T) |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 04/04/2017 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIA4UG5RB2658 |asin = B071WJ7G51 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = none |connactled = red (activity) |spdledcolor = green (10G), yellow (5G) |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "REPUBLIC OF GAMERS" is silkscreened on the top of the [https://rog.asus.com/media/149126690062.jpg cover]. :This device has a heatsink affixed to the Ethernet controller. Manufacturer reference: 90MC04N0-M0TAY0 *[https://rog.asus.com/articles/coming-soon/the-poseidon-gtx-1080-ti-and-other-new-rog-products-debut-at-jtr-outshine-the-competition/ On '''ROG ASUS'''] {{•}} [[Aquantia]] ===Specifications=== *Interface: 1x RJ-45, PCIe 3.0 x4 *Data Connection Rate: 100Mbps/1Gbps/2.5Gbps/5Gbps/10Gbps *Standard Compliance: :802.3u 100BaseTX :802.3ab 1000BaseT :802.3bz 2.5GBaseT :802.3bz 5GBaseT :802.3bz 10GBaseT *LED Indicator: :10G (Green): Flashing-NIC card is transferring data at 10Gbps :Under 5G (Yellow): Flashing-NIC card is transferring data under 5Gbps :Speed LED (Red): LED indicators On the Edge of PCB, ::shows Under 5G/10G/Activity (Flashing) ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/10908/aquantia-launches-new-2g-5g-multi-gigabit-network-controllers-for-pcs ''Aquantia AQC107'' on '''AnandTech'''] ([http://images.anandtech.com/doci/10908/aq2.jpg PCB image]) :AQC107: 100Mb/1GbE/2.5GbE/5GbE/10GbE (10GBase-T) :AQC108: 100Mb/1GbE/2.5GbE/5GbE (11x7 mm) *[https://cateee.net/lkddb/web-lkddb/NET_VENDOR_AQUANTIA.html Ethernet Network Cards that uses the aQuantia AQC107/AQC108 chipset] 
vendor: 1d6a, device: 0001
vendor: 1d6a, device: d100
vendor: 1d6a, device: d107
vendor: 1d6a, device: d108
vendor: 1d6a, device: d109
==See also== *ASUS ROG Areion 10G - ''10GBase-T PCIe LAN Card'' (Aquantia AQC107) • ([https://rog.asus.com/articles/networking/bring-10gbit-ethernet-home/ PR]) *[[ASUS ROG GR8 II]] - ''Mini Gaming PC'' (2T2R 802.11ac, BT 4.2) • [http://koolshare.cn/thread-128351-1-1.html Review] • [https://www.asus.com/Mini-PCs/ROG-GR8-II/ PPage] *[[ASUS XG-U2008]] - ''10GBase-T Network 10-Port Unmanaged Switch'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-U2008 PPage] *[[ASUS XG-C100C]] - ''10GBase-T PCIe Network Adapter'' (Aquantia AQC107) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-C100C/ PPage] :10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100Mbps; RJ45 port and built-in QoS; Jumbo Frame: up to 9 KB *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] (ROG Rapture Aura 10G) - AC9600 WiFi Gaming Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTG03H MSQ-RTG03H], IC ID: 3568A-RTG03H, PSU: 19V/3.42A *[[ASUS RT-AX88U]] - ''AX6000 Tri-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AC86U]] - ''AC2900 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTACHN00 MSQ-RTACHN00], IC ID: 3568A-RTAC86U, PSU: 19V/1.75A :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4906, WLAN: 2x BCM4366E (3T3R) *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC107]] - ''5/10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card'' ([http://www.anandtech.com/show/11024/gigabyte-exhibits-an-aquantia-aqc107-based-10g-ethernet-pcie-card PR]) *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC108]] - ''2.5/5GbE PCI-Express LAN Card'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
